content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 2.5) 
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 1.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position(2, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 2, 0) and a furnace at position(4, 0)

### Copper cable factory at position(3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(3, 0) and inserter at position(3.5, 0) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 3.5) that connects the furnace at position(2, 0) to the assembling machine at position(3, 0)

### Laboratory at position(3, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 3, 1) which is currently not powered

### Chest at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, 0.5) which currently has no items

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new pole
- Ensure that the first argument is a valid Prototype object before attempting to place a new pole.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Check the power connections to the lab and ensure that it is connected to a power source.

### Errors when lacking required ingredients for research
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients, specifically 10 automation science packs, before attempting to complete the research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
